step_feedback.feedback: Great job sitting or standing comfortably! Keep your hands on your abdomen for the next step.
Excellent! You're placing your hands on your abdomen. Prepare to inhale slowly through your nose.
Good inhale through your nose. Remember to tighten your whole body muscles as you breathe in and visualize fluid moving to your chest.
Well done relaxing your muscles as you exhale through your mouth. Keep visualizing pushing fluid out.
Second round, starting strong! You're comfortably positioned. Keep your hands on your abdomen.
Nicely done maintaining hand placement. Get ready to inhale deeply through your nose.
You're breathing in through your nose. Remember to engage your entire body muscles and imagine fluid moving towards your chest.
Fantastic exhale, relaxing your muscles and visualizing fluid expulsion. You've completed the exercise!

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the deep breathing exercise! Remember to inhale through your nose while tightening your body, visualizing fluid moving to your chest. Then, exhale through your mouth while relaxing, imagining pushing fluid out. Keep practicing this to help your lymphatic system.
